Name: Alfa Arms Goliaf AKS-74U Handguard
Description: The integrally machined handguard is manufactured from aluminium alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on AKS-74U. Fitted with Picatinny rail mounts on three sides, allowing the installation of additional equipment (tactical foregrips, flashlights, laser designators).
